contacts.name: Xikui
contacts.signature: I leave work right on time.

121150001.text: {NICKNAME}, you don't happen to be at Stargazer Navalia right now, are you?

121150002.text: Yea, I just happened to be handling some stuff here

121150004.text: How did you know? Miss Xikui, you're not stalking me, are you?

121150005.text: Sorry, now's not the time for jokes

121150006.text: I saw on cycrane system that you were nearby

121150007.text: There's an important task I need your help with. It's really urgent

121150008.text: The Exalting Sanctum's sky dome malfunctioned half an hour ago. It was probably caused by the unusual yinyang phenomena from Ambrosial Arbor's new growth

121150009.text: The technical details are complicated, so I won't elaborate. In short, one district has a serious problem, and it's about to explode

121150010.text: The entire Luofu has yet to fully recover from all the chaos, and there's no one available to handle this emergency. Fortunately, there is an office worker in the Sky-Faring Commission who jumped on a starskiff and flew to the sky dome to carry out an emergency fix

121150011.text: But that starskiff also broke down during the rescue (probably due to the yinyang phenomena again) and lost contact over Stargazer Navalia. It may have been forced to land or even crashed

121150012.text: I've already informed the Cloud Knights to send reinforcements asap

121150013.text: But one second can mean the difference between life and death for this kind of thing. Can you folks please go take a look first?

121150014.text: "You folks"? Is there someone else here?

121150015.text: Yes, Mr. Yang is also nearby

121150018.text: I'm still trying to find out

121150019.text: Your friend, Mr. Yang, is also nearby. I've already contacted him

121150020.text: Anyways, try to find a vantage point in Stargazer Navalia and use a cycrane to locate the starskiff, I'm counting on you folks

121150021.text: Also... this office worker is a bit special

121150022.text: I implore you both to do everything in your power to save her life
